categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Les créatures de Tschai was a roleplaying article in the French gaming magazine Graal. It was written by Vincent Lemoing and H D L and provided a bestiary for the campaign in the same issue of Graal.

It also contained a small text written by Vincent Lemoing from an in-universe perspective, entitled Les mystères de Tschaï and speaking of the biological relation between the Phungs, the Pnumes and the Night mastiffs.
